question:

Punjab PSC Network Engineer 2014

The internet control Message Protocol (ICMP):

Punjab PSC Network Engineer 2014
option_1: Allows gateways to send error a control messages to other gateways or hosts
option_2: provides communication between the internet Protocol Software on one machine and the internet Protocol Software on another
option_3: reports error conditions to the original source, the source must relate errors to individual application programs and take action to correct the problem

option_2: the sending IPv6 router creates one of more IPv6 fragments, one of which is larger than the maximum size of and IPv6 datagram
option_3: the sending IPv6 router creates an IPv6 datagram and puts it in the data field of an IPv4 datagram.
option_4: the sending IPv6 router creates an IPv6 datagram and intervening IPv4 routes will reject the IPv6 datagram.

question:
In asynchronous data transmission.

Punjab PSC Network Engineer 2014
option_1: Each character/byte is encapsulated within a start bit and a parity bit.
option_2: Each character/byte is encapsulated within a start bit and one or more stop bits.
option_3: No communication control characters are used.
option_4: Start bit is essential but the stop bit(s) is/are optional for each transmitted character/byte.

option_2: TDM requires the transmitter and receiver to be synchronized periodically
option_3: TDM performs efficiently if the data stream is probabilistic.
option_4: Statistical TDM is efficient if the data stream is deterministic.
